import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from'react';// import Img
import img from'../../../assets/img/furniture/common/offer-time.png';import img1 from'../../../assets/img/furniture/common/black.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlackFriday=()=>{const[timerDays,setTimerDays]=useState('00');const[timerHours,setTimerHours]=useState('00');const[timerMinutes,setTimerMinutes]=useState('00');const[timerSeconds,setTimerSeconds]=useState('00');let interval=useRef();const startTimer=()=>{const countdownDate=new Date('November 26 2021 00:00:00').getTime();interval=setInterval(()=>{const now=new Date().getTime();const distance=countdownDate-now;const days=Math.floor(distance/(1000*60*60*24));const hours=Math.floor(distance%(1000*60*60*24)/(1000*60*60));const minutes=Math.floor(distance%(1000*60*60)/(1000*60));const seconds=Math.floor(distance%(1000*60)/1000);if(distance<0){// stop Our Timer
clearInterval(interval.current);}else{// update Timer
setTimerDays(days);setTimerHours(hours);setTimerMinutes(minutes);setTimerSeconds(seconds);}},1000);};useEffect(()=>{startTimer();});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"offer_timer_two",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"offer_time_img_two",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img,alt:"img"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"offer_time_two_Content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img1,alt:"img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"countdown_two",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerDays}),"days"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerHours}),"Hours"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerMinutes}),"Minutes"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerSeconds}),"Seconds"]})]})})]})})]})})})});};export default BlackFriday;
